page.title: 19VILLAGE LIFE
page.content: As we surveyed our area we tried to find out what each person thought of the area. There were two different groups, one group who were born in the area and the other group were those who had moved into the area. The group who had moved into the area said that they liked the countryside. They did not know much about the buses but did most of their shopping by car in Hadleigh and Ipswich. The other group who had been born in the area said that the village had changed since they were children. There were now fewer buses and shops in the villages. The school in Kersey used to have many more children coming to it. There used to be a lot more jobs in Kersey.e.g. undertaker, grocers, sawyer (man who cut trees into wood). The roads used to be rougher and often they had ditches in them.
